settings.title: Delivered to you in 4-6 weeks
settings.content:
Each bike is custom built to rider size and spec. Certain frames are painted to order before being built into full bikes which can affect lead times.

Easy Assembly: From out the box, attach your seat post and wheels and you're ready to ride.

settings.title: Multiple ways to pay
settings.content: We accept multiple payment types. We also offer cycle to work schemes or 0% interest free payments with 25% deposit.

settings.title: Your Bike, Your Fit
settings.content:
We understand how crucial it is to achieve the perfect bike fit. Unlike other bike brands, we don’t just offer off-the-shelf bikes. Instead, we ensure your frame size is precisely matched to you before starting your bike build.

Simply upload your bike fit directly on the product page or provide your measurements after placing your order. We will then be in touch to discuss your fitting requirements.

settings.title: Shipping and Delivery
settings.content:
Your custom-built bike will be delivered within 4 weeks*, depending on the options you choose. You’ll receive regular updates throughout the process, keeping you informed until your bike is ready for delivery or collection.

UK

  • Free shipping is available for all frame and bike orders.
  • For other items, shipping costs are calculated at checkout.
  • VAT is included in product price.
  • We use DHL or DPD for UK deliveries.
  • Tracking information will be provided for all orders once dispatched.

EU, USA, Canada & Rest of the World

  • Taxes, duties and shipping are calculated at checkout.
  • Tracking information will be provided for all orders once dispatched.

*Lead times are subject to change

settings.title: Quick Assembly
settings.content:
We’ve simplified the assembly process to get you on the road faster. When your bike arrives, it’s 95% assembled, with only a few final touches needed:

• Insert the seat post.

• Fit the wheels.

settings.title: Build Process
settings.content:
As each bike is custom-built for the rider, it takes time to ensure everything is perfectly tuned to your needs. Here’s what to expect:

1. Custom Fit and Configuration

Your bike is tailored to your exact specifications, including frame size, components, and selected options, ensuring a perfect fit.

• 2. Paint Queue

The frame is sent to the paint queue for your chosen colour and finish.

• 3. Regular Updates

You’ll be kept informed throughout the build process.

• 4. Final Assembly and Inspection

Each bike is assembled and inspected to meet our high standards before shipping or collection.

For more details check out our Buying Process page.

settings.title: Discuss your new bike on webchat or contact us if you have any question:
settings.content: Tel. 01420 612700 or email sales@handslingbikes.com

settings.content: It's fast in racing, but also handles really well, which is important when I’m cornering in a criterium or road race
Great quality frameset which is outstanding to ride. Speed & comfort rarely come together on a road bike but my A1R0evo has it mastered.
The bike (itself) is fast, it climbs, its stable, it handles brilliantly, inspires confidence at speed and is comfortable; for an aero bike anyway.
The bike is super smooth but also has really sharp handling and just feels fast.
Stiff, nimble and really quick, yet more than comfortable…..that frame is seriously top! All the set up was spot on; using 28’s tyres perfect for the gnarly Yorkshire tarmac,
I was free wheeling when others where pedalling lol it just cut through the air! Roll on next event!
The bike - A1RO Evo Ultegra Di2 is a dream! It's fast without being twitchy, comfortable on long rides and climbs brilliantly too. Puts a smile on my face every time I ride it!

settings.title: Customer Reviews
settings.content: Check out more reviews of the Handsling A1R0evo on Trustpilot or Facebook.

settings.title: Key Design Features
settings.content:
The A1R0evo was designed 100% in-house and engineered by a veteran of the cycling industry.

  • Fully-integrated hidden cable design provides a clean look and aerodynamic advantage
  • Truncated tubes act like an aerofoil by creating kammtail air flow behind tube, but at reduced weight due to truncation
  • Stiff yet aero hourglass headtube resists twisting forces under hard efforts
  • Asymmetric fork to counter twisting forces of hard-braking with disc brakes, creating a more stable ride
  • Asymmetric chainstays resist pedalling forces, ensuring no wasted energy by turning lateral forces into forward momentum
  • Oversized short chainstays result in quick yet stable handling, maximising power transfer to back wheel while placing rider over rear to aid handling and traction
  • Dropped seatstays reduce the frontal area of the bike, aiding aerodynamic efficiency
  • Downtube flairs to full width of BB86 bottom bracket. Aluminium insert means no risk of galvanic corrosion.
  • Neutral British/US geometry is stable on downhills, while fast-reacting and nimble through the turns.
  • 12mm thru axles enhance frame and wheel stiffness
  • Hidden seatclamp to prevent dirt build up and sticking

settings.title: Frame Production
settings.content:
• Handsling controls all aspects of production and owns the moulds used to manufacture the frames
  • Manufactured using lightweight yet tough Toray T800 high-performance carbon
  • About 200g could be removed from the frame weight, but Handsling prioritises durability
  • Internal EPS internal moulds result in increased carbon compaction, eliminating small imperfections to make the frame light and stiff. 
  • Rigorous testing procedures surpass ISO standards.

settings.title: UCI-Approved and Race proven
settings.content:
The A1R0evo started life as the frame for the Handslinf Racing cycling team.

The UCI-approved is currently used at elite level by the DAS-Handsling Women's UCI Continental team in the UK and Chaney Windows & Doors pro team in the US.

settings.title: Comfort
settings.content:
• The A1R0evo is fast yet comfortable, enabling riders to finish faster and fresher
  • The frame accepts up to 32mm tyres, giving the opportunity for enhanced comfort on poor surfaces
  • Vertical compliance is paired with the lateral stiffness required for effective power transfer
  • Unique features including a tapered seat tube shape that dampens road vibrations
  • The A1R0evo is used by Ironman distance triathletes and ultra endurance racers, demonstrating its comfort over long distances

settings.title: Customised
settings.content:
• Bikes are assembled in Handsling's UK workshop according to rider size and spec 
  • Fully customised build options enable the rider to tailor the bike to suit riding style and budget
  • Bikes are fitted with high-end components from Shimano, SRAM, and Campagnolo
  • Handsling offers Remote Tailored Sizing to provide an opimised fit

Learn more

settings.title: Frameset Features
settings.content:
• Integrated headset bearings
  • Aero, interlocking headset spacers
  • Dedicated aero seatpost
  • Handsling superlight thru axles 142x12mm and 100x12mm

* Handsling handlebars sold separately: 

  • Handsling Race Integrated one piece carbon stem and handlebar (either 9, 10, 11, 12cm stem with either 38, 40, 42cm bar)

settings.title: Stiff, Robust & Lightweight.
settings.content:
Every cyclists wants a bike that combines aero advantage with the lightness and comfort for long days in the saddle. The Handsling A1R0evo delivers on all fronts.

The A1R0evo is the ultimate carbon fibre disc brake road bike. Designed by Handsling from scratch, it is stiff, robust, lightweight, and has clearance for up to 32mm tyres.

The bike will do everything well, from storming tight city centre crits to conquering steep mountain passes to floating over Belgian cobbles. It is used by pro cycling teams and enthusiasts throughout the world.

The UCI-approved bike is available in six sizes and 30+ limited edition colours.

settings.title: Sizing Guide
settings.content: Finding the right size bike can be a bit overwhelming, but don't worry - we're here to help. The right size bike will ensure a comfortable and safe ride, so it's important to take some time to find the perfect fit.

settings.title: Dimensions
settings.content: Carbon frames are manufactured in the Far East using moulds that are owned by Handsling. This provides full control over the production process and makes each and every model exclusive to the brand.

settings.text: Check out David Arthur's A1R0evo review

settings.title: BUILT JUST FOR YOU
settings.content: Every rider deserves a bike tailored to their unique riding style and performance goals. We offer personalised performance service for our high-performance carbon bikes.

settings.title: UCI-Approved Frame

settings.title: CARBON T800 TORAY
settings.content: High tensile and high modulus carbon fiber with patented Nanoalloy Technology for extreme performances.

settings.title: Bike Buying Consultation
settings.content: From sizing and frame colour, to wheels and components, your Handsling bike is custom fit to your personal requirements.

settings.title: Tailored Bike Fitting
settings.content: A properly fitting bike is essential for achieving peak performance and comfort on the road, track or trail. That's why we offer tailored bike fitting for our high-performance carbon bikes.
